description:
* At each voxel, assembles and solves a set of linear equations.
 ++ The matrix at each voxel may be the same or may be different.
 ++ This flexibility (for voxel-wise regressors) is one feature
    that makes 3dTfitter different from 3dDeconvolve.
 ++ Another distinguishing feature is that 3dTfitter allows for
    L2, L1, and L2+L1 (LASSO) regression solvers, and allows you
    to impose sign constraints on the solution parameters.
name: 3dTfitter

inputs.name: Right-Hand Side dataset
inputs.description: Specifies the right-hand-side 3D+time dataset. ('rset' can also be a 1D file with 1 column)

inputs.name: Left-Hand Side matrix
inputs.description: Specifies a column (or columns) of the left-hand-side matrix. More than one 'lset' can follow the '-LHS' option.

inputs.name: Polynomial Order
inputs.description: Add 'p+1' Legendre polynomial columns to the LHS matrix.

inputs.name: Vector Threshold
inputs.description: The value 'v' (between 0.0 and 0.09, inclusive) defines the threshold below which LHS vectors will be omitted from the regression analysis.

inputs.name: Convolution (FALTUNG) Model
inputs.description: Specifies a convolution (German: Faltung) model to be added to the LHS matrix. Followed by four arguments: 'fset', 'fpre', 'pen', 'fac'.

inputs.name: Least Squares Fit
inputs.description: Solve equations via least squares [the default method].

inputs.name: Least Sum of Absolute Errors
inputs.description: Solve equations via least sum of absolute residuals.

inputs.name: L2 LASSO Regression
inputs.description: Solve equations via least squares with a LASSO (L1) penalty on the coefficients. Followed by 'lam' and optional 'i j k ...'

inputs.name: LASSO Centro Block
inputs.description: Defines a block of coefficients that will be penalized together.

inputs.name: Square Root LASSO
inputs.description: Similar to '-l2lasso', but aims to minimize sqrt(Q2)+lam*L1.

inputs.name: Constrain Sign of Parameters
inputs.description: Indicates that the sign of some output LHS parameters should be constrained in the solution.

inputs.name: Constrain FALTUNG
inputs.description: Constrain the deconvolution time series from '-FALTUNG' to be positive if 'c' is '+' or to be negative if 'c' is '-'.

inputs.name: Prefix for Output
inputs.description: Prefix for the output dataset (LHS parameters) filename.

inputs.name: Output Labels
inputs.description: Specifies sub-brick labels in the output LHS parameter dataset.

inputs.name: Fitted Time Series Output
inputs.description: Prefix filename for the output fitted time series dataset.

inputs.name: Error Sums Output
inputs.description: Prefix filename for the error sums dataset.

inputs.name: Mask Dataset
inputs.description: Read in dataset 'ms' to use as a mask; only voxels with nonzero values in the mask will be processed.

author: AFNI Developers
